title: Spooky Mysteries: You Wouldn't Want to Know About! (Top 10 Worst)
features: A strange, spooky journey is about to begin! Enraptured readers will visit the pyramids of Egypt, where the mummy's curse is said to still haunt all who disturb its ancient treasures. We'll also travel to Roswell, New Mexico, where space aliens are said to have crash-landed on a remote ranch. Fascinating tales of vanishing ships, haunted houses, and other mysterious events within the pages of this book will make even the bravest sleuths shake in their shoes! Some mysteries might be too scary to solve!
description: Series Review: Top 10 Worst "Adults Aren'T Going To Be Charmed By These Books, But Boys Who Hate Reading Will Be... I Do Like The Way Vital Statistics Are Given For Each Of The Horrible Things In The Books. There'S Also A Lot Of Surprising Information...
